Variable description: Proportion of population reporting having felt discriminated against, by grounds of discrimination, sex and disability (%) 
 
 Variable code: VC_VOV_GDSD 
 
 Metadata available at: https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/metadata/files/Metadata-16-0b-01.pdf 
 
 Detailed sources: National Statistical Office - Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys (MICS6) National Statistical Office - Encuesta de Hogares National Statistical Office - Enquête sur les conditions de vies des ménages National Statistical Office - General Social Survey on Victimization National Statistical Office - Encuesta de Caracterización Socio Económica Nacional National Statistical Office - Enquête par grappes à indicateurs multiples avec volet paludisme (MICS6-PALU) National Statistical Office - Encuesta de Mujeres, Niñez y Adolescencia/MICS6 National Statistical Office - European Social Survey National Statistical Office - Survey on Health Impairment and Living conditions in Denmark (SHILD) National Statistical Office - Living Environment and Security Survey National Statistical Office - Rule of Law and Access to Justice Survey National Statistical Office - Social Development Indicator Survey (MICS6) National Statistical Office - Labour Force Survey National Statistical Office - Quarterly National Household Survey National Statistical Office - Health Survey National Statistical Office - National Survey on Discrimination National Statistical Office - Democratic Governance Survey National Statistical Office - Survey on the Assessment of the attitude of the general population towards elderly people National Statistical Office - General Social Survey National Statistical Office - Survey of Living Conditions National Statistical Office - Encuesta Nacional de Hogares (ENAHO) National Statistical Office - Social Cohesion Survey  National Statistical Office - Governance, Public Safety and Justice Survey Public Health Agency/National Statistical Office - National Public Health Survey  National Statistical Office - Survey on Diversity and Coexistence
